meanings.definition: The partial or complete absence of hair from areas of the body where it normally grows.
meanings.sent1: Alopecia can cause patches of hair loss on the scalp.
meanings.sent2: My aunt has alopecia, so she wears a wig to cover her bald spots.
meanings.sent3: The alopecia on the cat made it look like a tiny lion.
meanings.sent4: The garden's alopecia was evident after the harsh winter destroyed the plants.
meanings.sent5: The child's alopecia made her stand out among her classmates.

meanings.definition: A condition in which hair is lost from some or all areas of the body.
meanings.sent1: The alopecia in his beard made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about her alopecia and wore hats to hide it.
meanings.sent3: The alopecia on the teddy bear made it look like a wise old toy.
meanings.sent4: The forest's alopecia in autumn created a beautiful carpet of fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The dog's alopecia made it easier for the vet to examine its skin.
